ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description: An open-source, transparent, and lightweight Python software package capable of fitting dihedrals with QM calculations for existing forces fields. This software fits the Optimized Potentials for Liquid Simulations (OPLS) style dihedrals, then also analytically converts them to the periodic dihedral and Ryckaert-Bellemans (RB) torsion.
about.summary: An open-source, transparent, and lightweight Python software package capable of fitting dihedrals with QM calculations for existing forces fields. This software fits the Optimized Potentials for Liquid Simulations (OPLS) style dihedrals, then also analytically converts them to the periodic dihedral and Ryckaert-Bellemans (RB) torsion.

about.description: An open-source, transparent, and lightweight Python software package capable of fitting dihedrals with QM calculations for existing forces fields. This software fits the Optimized Potentials for Liquid Simulations (OPLS) style dihedrals, then also analytically converts them to the periodic dihedral and Ryckaert-Bellemans (RB) torsion.
about.summary: An open-source, transparent, and lightweight Python software package capable of fitting dihedrals with QM calculations for existing forces fields. This software fits the Optimized Potentials for Liquid Simulations (OPLS) style dihedrals, then also analytically converts them to the periodic dihedral and Ryckaert-Bellemans (RB) torsion.

name: mosdef-dihedral-fit
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set python_min = '3.10' %}
{% set python_max = '3.12' %}
{% set name = "mosdef-dihedral-fit" %}
{% set version = "0.1.13" %}
{% set build_number = "2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/GOMC-WSU/MoSDeF-dihedral-fit/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c2a9259369c073a53ac7714869bd3638b07502394440738dd315c6fda8f3d20f

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
  number: {{ build_number }}

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }},<{{ python_max }}
    - netcdf4
    - vmd-python
    - mosdef-gomc =1.4.0
    - pytest
    - pytest-cov
    - coverage
    - gsd =3.3.2

test:
  imports:
    - mosdef_dihedral_fit
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - pip check

about:
  home: https://github.com/GOMC-WSU/MoSDeF-dihedral-fit
  summary: An open-source, transparent, and lightweight Python software package capable of fitting dihedrals with QM calculations for existing forces fields. This software fits the Optimized Potentials for Liquid Simulations (OPLS) style dihedrals, then also analytically converts them to the periodic dihedral and Ryckaert-Bellemans
    (RB) torsion.
  description: An open-source, transparent, and lightweight Python software package capable of fitting dihedrals with QM calculations for existing forces fields. This software fits the Optimized Potentials for Liquid Simulations (OPLS) style dihedrals, then also analytically converts them to the periodic dihedral and Ryckaert-Bellemans
    (RB) torsion.
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  doc_url: https://github.com/GOMC-WSU/MoSDeF-dihedral-fit
  dev_url: https://github.com/GOMC-WSU/MoSDeF-dihedral-fit

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bc118
    - daico007
    - CalCraven
